attributes.action: Allow free movement in Europe after Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
To create a more cultured and intellectual society, we need to be able to explore the world and compare and relate their ideas to our and build off it! Families will be torn apart if we have to get visas, working abroad for your dream job will be lengthy process and retiring to the south of france is near to impossible. 
Lets take inspiration from Norway, Iceland, etc and make our it easy to expand our horizons!
attributes.background: We need the right of admissions to be able to travel through borders with only showing a passport. After Brexit we become "Third country nationals". It will be extremely difficult to access the right to work, study and live abroad. Sign this petition to get Parliament to grant us these rights.
